  • Why
  • What

Foxy Lib

Any Package. Anywhere. Anytime.

How


Never see $ command not found again.


When your host machine cannot resolve a command, it gets escalated to the Foxy Lib Servers where we execute it and return the result directly to your host machine.

Why

As developers, we spend too much time installing and configuring packages.

Less time installing,

More time BUILDING

More free space,

By using packages in the cloud.

Use Case:

Traditional install:

56 minutes

Foxy Lib:

15 seconds

What

Any Package. Anywhere. Anytime.

You and your company spend more time than necessary downloading software.
Allow Foxy Lib to do the heavy lifting for you.
We serve you some of the most difficult to download software in the cloud so that you can continue iterating quickly.
